item.description:
Sorry, but this meetup is sold out. The management of the USS Salem reduced the number of attendees we can bring to the event. If there is enough interest, we can schedule another event there, maybe this spring.

Thanks for understanding,

 

Sandy

 

 

The USS Salem is the world's only preserved US heavy cruiser. It is also haunted. On Friday, August 26th, you have an opportunity to investigate it, with members of the NE Ghost paranormal group. The investigation will last from 6pm to 1am. It costs $15 per person, which you will need to pay in advance in order to reserve a spot. Please RSVP here, so I can contact you with any changes to the event. Then please pay for the event by going to the following link: http://www.newenglandghost.org/publicevents.htm

I'm putting a limit on this of 20 meetup members. This is sure to be a popular event, so please register and pay soon, so you don't miss out.

 

To learn more about the ship, and to get directions, you can visit their website:

http://www.uss-salem.org/

 

To find out more about the ghosts in the ship, just Google it.

 

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Investigation of the haunted USS Salem--SOLD OUT
